title: CARDANO Branding In Indonesia
description: インドネシアでは、カルダノはおろか、ブロックチェーンについても知らない人が多い。人々を惑わすことは、インドネシアの多くの詐欺師が使う方法です。

f6_assessments.q0: This is a proposal without detail to market Cardano in Indonesia. Whilst that may be a laudable goal in itself, it does not address the challenge of helping early stage entrepreneurs.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan on what will actually be made and how it empowers entrepreneurs. Please provide a project plan on what you will produce and what the funds will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no detailed plan of what the funds will be used to produce which can be assessed against. No metrics to measure how this will help achieve the challenge are given. Thus progress and success cannot be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: First of all, you submitted it into the wrong challenge, you should submit it to "F6: Multilingual resources". It has no relation to entrepreneurship and won't help early stage entrepreneurs develop their skills to execute & communicate great ideas.  So please check the challenges in the Future Funds and select it appropriately.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no detailed plan, no info about the proposer, and the budget is relatively high
f6_assessments.q2: There are no details neither on the funds nor on the plan how they will be used. Therefore audit won't be possible

solution:
1\.Educating : セミナー、トレーニング、ワークショップ、コーチング、メンタリング、ギャザリング

2\.Marketing : Website, Translate Bahasa, Social ,Influencer
experience:
ビジネストレーニング＆コーチングで4年以上の経験を持つ

暗号通貨ビジネスに8年以上従事
